title: Behind The Idea #72: MMM And The Growth Trap
description: What's going on with 3M Company? The Q1 earnings report led to the company's worst month in at least a decade, and concerns over its future growth prospects. SA author Michael Boyd argued that this was overdue, and that there are more fundamental issues going on. Does that make sense? We review the company's recent challenges, its history of innovation, and its dividend-oriented investor base to try to find some answers.
itunes:title: MMM And The Growth Trap
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: The industrial giant has suffered one of its worst months ever - a turning point or a bump in the road?
